overview.en: Eximchain (EXC) is a cryptocurrency and operates on the Ethereum platform. Eximchain has a current supply of 150,000,000 with 67,306,444 in circulation. The last known price of Eximchain is 0.02356028 USD and is up 0.00 over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at https://www.eximchain.com.
